mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (NO, STORENAME, ORDERNUMBER, ID, CONTENTS, REGDATE, REF, PNUM, REPLY) VALUES(#{no},#{storeName},#{orderNumber},#{id}, #{contents},SYSDATE,#{ref},#{pnum},#{reply})
mapper.select: SELECT NO, STORENAME, ORDERNUMBER, ID, CONTENTS, REGDATE, REF, PNUM, REPLY FROM REPLY WHERE STORENAME = #{storeName}
